Get Found Online in Port Townsend

Hi, I'm Kyle England. After 38 years in tech, I moved to Port Townsend in 2024 and fell in love with this community. Now I help local Peninsula businesses get the online visibility they deserve—without the technical headaches or corporate agency runaround.

Why Port Townsend Businesses Choose Olympic SEO

Local expertise meets proven results. We understand the unique challenges and opportunities of Olympic Peninsula businesses.

I'm Your Neighbor

When I moved to Port Townsend in 2024, I discovered something special—a community where businesses actually care about their customers. I wanted to help these businesses get found online by the people who matter: locals and visitors who appreciate authentic experiences.

I Understand Peninsula Challenges

Seasonal tourism, ferry-dependent customers, competition from Seattle agencies who don't "get" our area. In my first year serving local businesses, I've learned what works here—and what definitely doesn't. Most Peninsula businesses need simple, reliable systems, not complex corporate solutions.

ADHD-Friendly Approach

My ADHD means I get overwhelmed by complex systems, so I build simple ones that just work. If tech anxiety keeps you up at night (like it did me), you'll appreciate my straightforward approach. No confusing dashboards, no technical jargon, no maintenance headaches.

24-Hour Response

Local, personal service with a commitment to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours.
